00071 static char *more_report_labels[8]= {
00072     "admissions and financial aid [A]",
00073     "athletics [T]",
00074     "development and alumni affairs [D]",

00083 //---------- Begin of function MoreReport::eval_letter_report ------------//
00085 void MoreReport::more_report_report(int refreshFlag) {
00086     int tab1=REPORT_X1,tab2=REPORT_X1+100,
00087         tab3=REPORT_X1+200,tab4=REPORT_X1+700;
00088     int vtab1=REPORT_Y1+15,vtab2=REPORT_Y1+70,
00089         vtab3=REPORT_Y1+75,vtab4=REPORT_Y1+350;
00090     vga.use_back();
00091 
00092     sys.is_institution_report=1;
00093     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
00094         if(more_report_init_flag )
00095             deinit();
00096 
00097         //------------- paint the background ----------------//
00098         if (!more_report_init_flag) {
00099             user_interface.bg_img(BG_PIC_ID, &vga_back);
00100             info.disp_column_bitmap(&vga_back);
00101             more_report_init_flag = 1;
00102             font_hstone.put(tab3+40,REPORT_Y1,"SELECT A REPORT TO SEE : ");
00103             for(int i=0;i<8;i++) {
00104                 //                              image_interface.put_back( tab2,vtab1+40*i, "DSPB_UP" );
00105                 //                              vga.blt_buf(tab2,vtab1+40*i,tab2+70,vtab1+40*i+28);
00106                 font_stone.put(tab3,vtab1+40*i+20,more_report_labels[i]);
00107             }
00108         }
00109     }
00110     //------- blt the back buffer to front buffer -------//
00111     vga.blt_buf(ZOOM_X1, ZOOM_Y1, ZOOM_X2, ZOOM_Y2);
00112 }

00118 int MoreReport::more_report_detect() {
00119     int tab1=REPORT_X1,tab2=REPORT_X1+100,
00120         tab3=REPORT_X1+200,tab4=REPORT_X1+600;
00121     int vtab1=REPORT_Y1+15,vtab2=REPORT_Y1+70,
00122         vtab3=REPORT_Y1+100,vtab4=REPORT_Y1+350;
00123     if (!more_report_init_flag)
00124         return 0;
00125 
00126     for(int j=0;j<8;j++)
00127         font_stone.put(tab3,vtab1+40*j+20,more_report_labels[j]);
00128 
00129     for(int i=0;i<8;i++) {
00130         if(mouse.in_area(tab3,vtab1+40*i+20,tab4,vtab1+40*i+48)) {
00131             font_hstone.put
00132                 (tab3,vtab1+40*i+20,more_report_labels[i]);
00133         }
00134         if(mouse.single_click(tab3,vtab1+40*i+20,tab4,vtab1+40*i+48)) {
00135             //                  image_interface.put_back( tab2,vtab1+40*i, "DSPB_DN" );
00136             //                  vga.blt_buf(tab2,vtab1+40*i,tab2+70,vtab1+40*i+28);
00137             switch(i) {
00138             case 0:
00139                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_ADMISSIONS - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00140                 break;
00141 
00142             case 1:
00143                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_STADIUM - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00144                 break;
00145 
00146             case 2:
00147                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_DEVELOPMENT - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00148                 break;
00149 
00150             case 3:
00151                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_FACILITIES - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00152                 break;
00153 
00154             case 4:
00155                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_LIBRARY - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00156                 break;
00157 
00158             case 5:
00159                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_OLD_MAIN - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00160                 break;
00161 
00162             case 6:
00163                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_POLICE - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00164                 break;
00165 
00166             case 7:
00167                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_PARK_LOTS - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00168                 break;
00169             }
00170         }
00171 
00172         //      "admissions and financial aid (A)",
00173         //      "athletics (T)",
00174         //      "development and alumni affairs (D)",
00175         //      "facilities management (F)",
00176         //      "library and informantion technology (L)",
00177         //      "investment (I)",
00178         //      "crime (C)",
00179         //      "parking (K)",
00180         int keyScanCode;
00181         if(keyScanCode=mouse.is_key_event()) {
00182             if(mouse.is_key(keyScanCode,mouse.event_skey_state,'a',K_CHAR_KEY))
00183                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_ADMISSIONS - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00184 
00185             if(mouse.is_key(keyScanCode,mouse.event_skey_state,'t',K_CHAR_KEY))
00186                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_STADIUM - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00187 
00188             if(mouse.is_key(keyScanCode,mouse.event_skey_state,'d',K_CHAR_KEY))
00189                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_DEVELOPMENT - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00190 
00191             if(mouse.is_key(keyScanCode,mouse.event_skey_state,'f',K_CHAR_KEY))
00192                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_FACILITIES - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00193 
00194             if(mouse.is_key(keyScanCode,mouse.event_skey_state,'l',K_CHAR_KEY))
00195                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_LIBRARY - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00196 
00197             if(mouse.is_key(keyScanCode,mouse.event_skey_state,'i',K_CHAR_KEY))
00198                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_OLD_MAIN - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00199 
00200             if(mouse.is_key(keyScanCode,mouse.event_skey_state,'c',K_CHAR_KEY))
00201                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_POLICE - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00202 
00203             if(mouse.is_key(keyScanCode,mouse.event_skey_state,'k',K_CHAR_KEY))
00204                 sys.set_view_mode(MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM + FIRM_PARK_LOTS - FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID );
00205         }
00206     }
00207     return 0;
00208 }
